name: YES or YES
description: a bright and lively 'color pop' song in the synth-pop genre with influences from Motown, reggae and arena pop.

lines: Hey, boy
Look, I'm gonna make this simple for you
You got two choices
Yes or yes?
내가 이렇게도 이기적이었던가
뭔가 이렇게 갖고 싶던 적 있었나 (있었나)
다 놀라 (다 놀라) 내 뻔뻔함에
Come on and tell me yes
Ah 둘 중에 하나만 골라 yes or yes?
Ah-ah 하나만 선택해 어서 yes or yes?

name: Super Shy
description: a song about the internal struggle of someone who wants to express their feelings to a crush but is too shy to do so

lines: And I wanna go out with you, where you wanna go? (Huh?)
Find a lil' spot, just sit and talk
Looking pretty, follow me, 우리 둘이 나란히
보이지? 내 눈이 갑자기 빛나지 when you say I'm your dream
You don't even know my name, do you?
You don't even know my name, do you?
나 원래 말도 잘하고 그런데 왜 이런지?
I don't like that
Something odd about you, yeah, you're special and you know it
You're the top, babe
I'm super shy, super shy
But wait a minute while I make you mine, make you mine
떨리는 지금도 you're on my mind all the time
I wanna tell you, but I'm super shy, super shy
You don't even know my name (super shy, super shy)
Do you? (Make you mine, make you mine)
You don't even know my name (you're on my mind all the time, I wanna tell you)
Do you? (But I'm super shy, I'm super shy)
tung tung sahur
tung tung sahur
tung tung sahur

name: Eye of the Tiger
description: The classic motivational rock anthem from Rocky III

lines: Risin' up, back on the street
Did my time, took my chances
Went the distance, now I'm back on my feet
Just a man and his will to survive
It's the eye of the tiger
It's the thrill of the fight
Risin' up to the challenge of our rival
And the last known survivor
Stalks his prey in the night
And he's watchin' us all with the eye of the tiger

name: Kenny G Collection
description: Smooth jazz instrumentals perfect for relaxation

name: Nocturnal
description: Synthwave track capturing the feeling of late night drives

lines: City lights reflect in your eyes
As we drive through the neon night
Radio plays our favorite song
This moment feels so right

name: Unravel
description: Emotional rock ballad about falling apart and rebuilding

lines: All the words I couldn't say
Pile up and fade away
Every promise that I made
Now just memories decay

name: DNA
description: On 'DNA.,' Kendrick Lamar adopts multiple viewpoints; celebrating, critiquing, and exploring his black heritage and culture.

lines: I got loyalty, got royalty inside my DNA
Cocaine quarter piece, got war and peace inside my DNA
I got power, poison, pain and joy inside my DNA
I got hustle though, ambition, flow, inside my DNA
Tell me somethin', you mothafuckas can't tell me nothin'
I'd rather die than to listen to you
My DNA not for imitation
Your DNA an abomination
